CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 13, 1953, pg. 27, reads: "Track Winners - Miller Grade School again came up with the top track team in the city as it won the Grade School Track Meet held last week. Members of the team, shown above, are, left to right, back row: Donald Jones, Joseph Thomas, Donald Green, Charles B. Watkins, coach; Lawrence Eleam, Gary Griffin and David Boggus. Middle row: James Biglow, George Jones, Stanley Edwards, George Barnette, Theodore Andrews, Dennis Cuff, Billy Joe Lee and Michael Manna. Bottom row: Robert Graves, James Avery, Dennis Felton, James Singleton, Ralph Critten, Richard Green and Fletcher Hardy. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Miller Elementary School track team, back row from left: Donald Jones, Joseph Thomas, Donald Green, coach Charles B. Watkins, Lawrence Eleam, Gary Griffin, David Boggus; middle row: James Biglow, George Jones, Stanley Edwards, George Barnette, Theodore Andrews, Dennis Cuff, Billy Joe Lee, Michael Manna; bottom row: Robert Graves, James Avery, Dennis Felton, James Singleton, Ralph Critten, Richard Green and Fletcher Hardy
